name: ENES213
title: Virtus Living and Learning Community Seminar III
description: Prerequisite: ENES113. Restriction: Must be a participant in the second year of the Virtus program. The seminar focuses on personal, academic and professional success by cultivating leadership skills, developing academic and technical ability and encouraging self awareness, identifying and employing strategies for academic and professional success, further enhancing career development through networking and mentoring and developing awareness of diversity issues.
